%S A050829 2,4,4,4,6,6,8,8,8,8,10,10,12,14,16,16,16,16,16,16,16,18,18,20,22,24,
%T A050829 26,28,30,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,32,34,34,36,38,40,42,44,46,46,48,
%U A050829 48,50,52,54,54,56,56,58,58,60,60,62,64,64,64,64,64,64,64,64,64,64,64
%N A050829 Even numbers in the sequence generated by a(n) = a(a(n-3)) + a(n-a(n-3)).
%H A050829 Matthew House, <a href="/A050829/b050829.txt">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>
%t A050829 a[1]=1; a[2]=1; a[3]=1; a[n_]:= a[n] = a[a[n-3]] + a[n-a[n-3]]; Select[ Array[a, 200], EvenQ] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Jul 28 2015 *)
